title: Chittenango man faces drug charges
content: Order Prints        ARTICLE OPTIONS     ROSSIE — A Chittenango man was charged by state police with possessing drugs.    Jeffrey D. Mento, 26, faces one count each of seventh-degree criminal possession of a weapon and fourth-degree criminal possession of marijuana, both Class A misdemeanors, police said.    He was arrested at 3:15 p.m. Friday while traveling on Route 11, town of Rossie, police said.
